Depending on geographical distribution of your team it might be a face-to-face meeting (why not have a lunch?) or just a call.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Meeting via an online call?
